name: Gabriel Coutinho
content: Home I am a tenured assistant professor (professor adjunto) of the Computer Science Department at UFMG, in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.My main research interests are in algebraic graph theory, quantum computing and semidefinite optimization.Do you want to be my student or postdoc? Check here.I also work on optimization and machine learning applications to real world problems within several outreach projects with Brazilian companies.I am an associate editor at Computational & Applied Mathematics. I am a member of SBMAC and SIAM.
